name: Torture Chamber
longDesc: a room full of gruesome metal implements- the particualrs of their use fortunately obscured by years of age and rust. It's clear that the purpose of this room was not to welcome honored guests.
shortDesc: a room full of gruseome implements of torture.

shelves.name: rusted chest
shelves.desc: a half-rotted chest with rusted hardward- better not to think about what sort of things it once held.

doors.name: bloodstained arch
doors.desc: a stone archway to the south bears disturbing stains of a dark brownish red.
